newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Shenzhen Textile 1996 net dives 60 pct.
newsitem.headline: Shenzhen Textile 1996 net dives 60 pct.

text.p: (in millions of yuan unless stated, against 1995 figures)
Earnings per share 0.116 yuan vs 0.148 yuan
Net assets per share 2.92 yuan vs 2.81 yuan
Company name: Shenzhen Textile (Holdings) Co Ltd

Note: The results, contained in an annual report published in the Shenzhen-based Securities Times on Monday, were calculated under Chinese accounting standards, except for the net profit figure which was based on international standards.
Based on Chinese standards, the company posted net profits of 15.82 million yuan for 1996 against 20.19 million yuan for 1995.
The firm has proposed no dividend for 1996 but a two-for-10 bonus issue based on capital surplus, pending approval of shareholders at a meeting on June 18, the annual report said.
Trading in the company's A and B shares was suspended on Monday morning and will resume in the afternoon, according to the Shenzhen Stock Exchange.
